metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26950 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - high.
metadata.Description: In certain circumstances, the MCallGetProperty opcode can be emitted with unmet assumptions resulting in an exploitable use-after-free condition. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 82.0.3, Firefox ESR < 78.4.1, and Thunderbird < 78.4.2.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '82.0.3+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1').
